subject: Attention Recipient,
body:
Attention Recipient,
The UK High Commission in the Republic of Benin, Ghana, Burkina Faso,
CÃ´te d'Ivoire, UK, and Nigeria received a fraud report against you and
other citizens of the UK, USA, Europe, Malaysia, Japan, etc. The
government of these five West African countries whose citizens were
involved in these fraudulent activities has set up a committee to
compensate all victims of the fraud due to pressure from the UN and
the international community. Your name and the names of other fraud
victims have been sent to this committee for compensation. All victims
were paid compensation through ATM cards.
However, your ATM CARD was among those that were reported as unclaimed
and we would like to advise you to follow the committee's instructions
below to ensure that you receive your ATM CARD for your own use
immediately.
The ATM card was issued based on an email address/name that was
believed to be fraudulent in the past and has been verified by the
government and this committee. Any victim who does not verify his/her
own is presumed dead and his/her next of kin do not have access to
his/her information, so they were not aware of the ongoing
compensation. The total amount of funds credited to this ATM card is
500,000.00 US dollars (five hundred thousand US dollars).
We recommend that you do whatever is necessary to ensure that you
receive your ATM CARD without further delay. You are confident in the
safety and availability of your ATM card. Please note that you should
stop further contact/association with all front lawyers and security
companies that have deceived you in their cooperation.
Contact Reverend Father Daniel Komi with the following information:
REV. FATHER DANIEL KOMI.
EMAIL ADDRESS: (
danielkomi4@outlook.com
)
Direct Cellular: +22897987014
Please call him and ask him for a bank card. He will hand you your
sealed ATM card. Include your complete information as shown below so
he can reconcile his file.
1) Your full name ........................................
2) Country ............
3) Home/office address:...
4) Profession ...............
5) Age: ......
6) sex ......
7) Direct phone......
8) Copy of your ID
Sincerely
Kelly Brown
Chairman of the Compensation Committee.

subject: Re:   Attention Recipient,
body:
Hello Kelly Brown,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware of any fraudulent activities against me. It's good to know that there are committees like yours working hard to rectify these situations.

I'm curious about how the committee was able to identify me as a victim of fraud? Also, could you please explain more about the process of verifying an email address name? 

You mentioned that my ATM card has been issued based on an email address name. Could you clarify which email address was used for this?

Also, I'd like to understand more about how the funds were credited to this ATM card. Is it possible for you to provide some details on this?

Lastly, you've asked me to contact REV. FATHER DANIEL KOMI and provide him with my complete details. Before doing so, could you tell me more about who he is and his role in this process?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Chris
